alert.note: Alert for Clark; Clinton; Fayette; Greene; Madison; Montgomery; Warren (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 01 at 7:07PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN WARREN, NORTHWESTERN FAYETTE, NORTHWESTERN CLINTON, SOUTHEASTERN CLARK, GREENE, SOUTHEASTERN MONTGOMERY AND SOUTHWESTERN MADISON COUNTIES THROUGH 730 PM EST... At 707 PM EST, a strong thunderstorm was located near Bellbrook, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Kettering, Beavercreek, Xenia, Miamisburg, Springboro, Bellbrook, Cedarville, Waynesville, Jamestown, Jeffersonville, Wilberforce, New Jasper, Harveysburg, Spring Valley, Corwin, South Solon, Bowersville, Centerville, Octa and Paintersville. This includes I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 62 and 67. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Clark; Clinton; Fayette; Greene; Madison; Montgomery; Warren
